dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to approach me, mortal? Speak quickly, for your presence here is an affront to the darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek no quarrel, I only wish to pass through peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? There is no place for peace in these cursed lands. You are either conqueror or conquered.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Understood, I shall leave you to your domain.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you should. Your wisdom in retreat is acknowledged. Begone from my sight.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down. Stand aside or face the consequences.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a mere mortal. Prepare to face the wrath of the undead.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your arrogance blinds you, Wight King. I am not one to fear your empty threats.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Arrogance? You are amusing, mortal. But your defiance shall be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have faced greater foes than you and emerged victorious. Yield or face defeat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impudent fool. Your bravado will cost you dearly. Prepare for eternal darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let us put our differences aside. There are greater threats in these lands than each other.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! Cowardice masked as diplomacy. There is no unity between the living and the dead.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Enough of this banter. I will not waste words with the likes of you. Prepare for battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ahh, the straightforward approach. How refreshing. Let us dance the dance of death, mortal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I relish the challenge. Let our blades meet in combat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. May your soul find peace in the darkness that awaits.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see no honor in this fight. Perhaps another time, Wight King.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Honor? In a world consumed by darkness? Your words amuse me. Leave before I change my mind.
